To Do:
' ... So, ant strips out any quotes unconditionally and javadoc produces unusable results ... :(
creator: elkner@linofee.org
levylambert@tiscali-dsl.de
text:
In ant 1.5.3 and 1.5.2 there is a nested tag element, so you do not need to put 
-tag in additionalparams. Actually, this nested tag element is used in ant's own 
build.
So nesting under javadoc this line should do what you need :
      <tag name="todo" description="To do:" scope="all"/>
I am closing your bug report as "WORKSFORME".
Please reopen it if you are unsatisfied with the answer.
Antoine
